code: class  Solution  {   public :   ListNode *  swapNodes ( ListNode *  head ,  int  k )  {   ListNode *  p  =  nullptr ;    ListNode *  q  =  nullptr ;    for  ( ListNode *  curr  =  head ;  curr  !=  nullptr ;  curr  =  curr -> next )  {   if  ( q  !=  nullptr )   q  =  q -> next ;   if  ( -- k  ==  0 )  {   p  =  curr ;   q  =  head ;   }   }   swap ( p -> val ,  q -> val );   return  head ;   }  };
